posts.postText: I spawned outside the map, on a roof, in the ceiling & 500 feet in the air.
apparently we are getting ddos'd.... again.....
Same thing happened to me. It's really annoying spawning 500+ in the air at the start of the round.
People were saying no lag.... too....
It's a sad excuse for a ddos. It happened to perp and I believe Jail as well. Not to mention flood (i think).
It was because of a DRDoS, a form of DDoS attack. It should have stopped by now.
